GLG / x-autocomplete

This web-component to replace the existing jQuery auto-complete component. Using the native HTML5 datalist and built-in browser capabilities to parse through existing lists.

Default included information is {{ name }} {{ sector }} and a label attribute with {{ state }}.

A few test examples:
  • Demand Media
  • Time Warner Cable
  • Texas Tech
  • Life Time Fitness
  • Tyco International
  • Hankore Environment Tech

Example Code

index.html

<script src="../../bower_components/platform/platform.js"></script>
<link rel="import" href="x-autocomplete.html">

<x-autocomplete></x-autocomplete>

x-autocomplete.html

<polymer-element name="x-autocomplete">
<template>
  <div class="formitem">
    <label class="visually-hidden" for="auto-complete">List of {{ header }}</label>
    <input id="auto-complete" list="artists" type="text" placeholder="{{ header }}" autocomplete="off">

    <datalist id="artists">
      <option template repeat="{{ artists }}" value="{{ artist }}, {{ nationality }}" label="{{ style }}">{{ artist }}</option>
    </datalist>
  </div>
</template>
<polymer-jsonp auto url="json-datalist.json?format=json&jsoncallback=" response="{{ artist }}"></polymer-jsonp>
</polymer-element>

json-datalist.json

<script>
  Polymer('x-autocomplete', {
    header: "Artists",
    artists: [{
      artist: "Jackson Pollock",
      style: "Abstract Expressionism",
